title: Peru Holds Key Rate Steady With Inflation Well Below Target
description: Peru held borrowing costs at a three-year low with inflation below the center of the central bank’s target range and the economy growing steadily.
content: Peru held borrowing costs at a three-year low with inflation below the center of the central bank’s target range and the economy growing steadily.
